Convert LINKAGES's output into netCDF format

Source: R/model2netcdf.LINKAGES.R
model2netcdf.LINKAGES.Rd

Convert MODEL output into the NACP Intercomparison format (ALMA using netCDF)

Usage

model2netcdf.LINKAGES(
  outdir,
  sitelat,
  sitelon,
  start_date = NULL,
  end_date = NULL,
  pft_names = NULL
)

Arguments

outdir

Location of model output

sitelat

Latitude of the site

sitelon

Longitude of the site

start_date

Start time of the simulation

end_date

End time of the simulation

pft_names

names of PFTs to use in output labels

Author

Ann Raiho, Betsy Cowdery

On this page

Developed by Mike Dietze, Ann Raiho.
